articles.title: COVID-19 in Quebec: What you need to know on Friday - CBC.ca
articles.description: Fully vaccinated Americans could soon be allowed into Canada for non-essential travel. Quebec's health minister is providing an update about the vaccination campaign. Here's what you need to know.
articles.content:
• Quebec reported 83 new cases of COVID-19 on Thursday and three deaths that occurred before July 14. 
  • Since the start of the pandemic, there have been 376,192 confirmed cases and 11,23… [+3453 chars]
